The'47FLYING SAUCER CRASHdatabase and the GreatWave of 1973 datapage remain posted at this time. The former contentof this site has been removed as per advisement from FUSE INTERNET ACCESS.They notify that the space used to retain the information on these pagesexceeds the storage amount they provide.

I will continue to dispatch Email newsand updates for those interested. If you are not currently but would liketo be added to an Email list that I have/will set aside for news relateditems, feel free to contact me at ufo@fuse.net.

Thanks for visiting,
